name: Natalie Brooks: The Treasures of the Lost Kingdom
name_original: Natalie Brooks: The Treasures of the Lost Kingdom
description:
Natalie Brooks: The Treasures of the Lost Kingdom is a game developed by Alawar Entertainment. It came out on 19-12-2008. Alawar Entertainment published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Natalie Brooks: The Treasures of the Lost Kingdom on PC.
